title: AI Content Generator
description: AI-powered content generation platform with GPT-4 integration, custom templates, and collaborative editing features.
content: const{Fragment:n,jsx:t,jsxs:e}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const o={h1:"h1",p:"p",...r.components};return e(n,{children:[t(o.h1,{children:"AI Content Generator"}),"\n",t(o.p,{children:"Transform your content creation with AI-powered tools."})]})}return{default:function(n={}){const{wrapper:e}=n.components||{};return e?t(e,{...n,children:t(_createMdxContent,{...n})}):_createMdxContent(n)}};
overview: AI-powered content generation platform that helps marketers and writers create high-quality content using advanced language models and custom templates.
challenge: Creating an intuitive interface for AI content generation while managing API costs, ensuring content quality, and enabling real-time collaboration.
solution: Built React-based editor with real-time preview, implemented smart caching to reduce API calls, integrated WebSocket for collaborative editing, and created custom prompt templates.
results: Platform generates 50,000+ pieces of content monthly, reduces content creation time by 70%, and maintains 95% user satisfaction rate.

title: Custom Real Estate CRM SaaS
description: Built CRM SaaS with Auth, RBAC, dashboards, Gmail API integration, Supabase backend, CI/CD pipeline, and GoDaddy domain deployment using Lovable AI.
overview: Custom CRM SaaS for real estate deal and contact management. Transformed Lovable AI mockups into secure, scalable dashboards with full backend logic and frontend UI deployment.
challenge: The client needed a production-ready CRM with multi-role dashboards (Superadmin, Admin, Agents, Assistants), secure authentication with RBAC, and seamless Gmail integrationâ€”all starting from AI-generated mockups that required complete backend implementation.
solution: Integrated Supabase for authentication and role-based access control, rebuilt AI mockups into fully interactive dashboards with real-time data, implemented Gmail API for email management, and set up automated CI/CD deployment pipeline with custom domain configuration.
results: Delivered a fully functional CRM with 4 distinct role-based dashboards, secure authentication system, automated deployment pipeline, and Gmail integration. Client successfully managing real estate deals and contacts with scalable infrastructure.

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with payment integration, inventory management, and real-time analytics dashboard.
content: const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:t}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const o={h1:"h1",p:"p",...r.components};return t(e,{children:[n(o.h1,{children:"E-Commerce Platform"}),"\n",n(o.p,{children:"A comprehensive e-commerce solution built for modern retail."})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:t}=e.components||{};return t?n(t,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};
overview: Modern e-commerce platform with seamless checkout experience, real-time inventory tracking, and comprehensive admin dashboard for managing products and orders.
challenge: Building a scalable e-commerce solution that handles high traffic, secure payment processing, and real-time inventory updates across multiple warehouses.
solution: Implemented Next.js with server-side rendering for SEO, integrated Stripe for secure payments, used Redis for caching and session management, and PostgreSQL for reliable data storage.
results: Launched platform handling 10,000+ daily transactions with 99.9% uptime, reduced checkout time by 40%, and increased conversion rate by 25%.

title: Project Management Tool
description: Collaborative project management platform with kanban boards, time tracking, and team analytics.
content: const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:t}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const o={h1:"h1",p:"p",...r.components};return t(e,{children:[n(o.h1,{children:"Project Management Tool"}),"\n",n(o.p,{children:"Streamline your team's workflow with powerful project management."})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:t}=e.components||{};return t?n(t,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};
overview: Comprehensive project management platform with drag-and-drop kanban boards, time tracking, team collaboration tools, and advanced analytics.
challenge: Building a real-time collaborative platform that scales to handle large teams while maintaining performance and providing insightful analytics.
solution: Leveraged Firebase for real-time data sync, implemented Vue.js for reactive UI, created custom Chart.js visualizations, and optimized with lazy loading and caching.
results: Platform supports 5,000+ active teams, processes 100,000+ tasks monthly, and improves team productivity by 35% according to user surveys.
